value:
Jagen says I must grow stronger...
Malledus says I must grow wiser...
Being a prince is no easy task.

My father, King Cornelius, is the
grandson of the younger brother
of the Hero Anri...$k$pThat means I have hero's blood
in my veins, doesn't it?

The people of this castle fight with
such regularity. They should be sure
to rest! ...As my sister would insist.

There would be quite the celebration
if someone like you were to fight for
Altea, $Nu.

Everyone here is so nice, I have not
been lonely a second. And besides,
there are a few familiar faces...

I've been sent to wish you all the
best, $Nu!

I'm glad that was resolved... Next
time, I will take even bolder action.
Not bad. But not perfect either.

Elice...Merric... Without you, I am
surely lost.

Thank you. In Altea's name, I pledge
to grow stronger!

I'm Marth, Prince of Altea.
I hope the two of us get along
well together!

It's strange, $Nu...$k$pEven when we had just met, I had
a feeling we'd grow close.$k$pWithout words, there was a natural
connection... My father once said
true friendship is like that.$k$pI have a few good friends... Merric,
Jagen and the rest of the knights,
and my sister, Elice.$k$pAll of them are important to me.
And you have grown to be equally
important, $Nu.
はいっ
Here I come!
うわあっ
That hurts...!
I'll do what I can!
I will protect the land!
I'll test my strength!
For Altea!
I'm sorry...
Giggle...
My name is Marth. I hope we can become great friends.
Whoah! You startled me. It seems you like teasing people, huh?
My elder sister is a very kindhearted person.
I must get strong, and study hard so I can become a great king someday.
My friend Merric is quite adept at magic.
Altea is at peace. I hope it stays that way forever...
I'm eager to learn as much as I can at your side.
This way?
I must be careful...
I will go.
